message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point, but I wanted to give you the first opportunity to consider it.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
I understand your position, Bob. However, $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $9,000. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can we meet at $9,500?
